name: Asian Cucumber and Peanut Salad
author: tammyn316
summary: A fresh cucumber salad with a real kick! My mom adds rice noodles making it a great lunch or dinner add-on. I prefer it as it is.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
2  cucumbers - halved lengthwise, seeds scraped out with a spoon, and thinly sliced
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a small skillet over medium heat; cook and stir garlic until softened and lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Whisk vinegar and sugar in a salad bowl until sugar has dissolved; add chili-garlic sauce, fish sauce, coriander, cooked garlic, and red pepper flakes until thoroughly combined
Stir in cucumbers, peanuts, and green onions to coat with dressing
Refrigerate at least 1 hour to overnight
